alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Essex; Lamoille; Orleans; Washington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 14 at 3:19PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Snow showers will impact portions of eastern Lamoille, northwestern Caledonia, Orleans, northwestern Essex and northeastern Washington Counties through 400 PM EST... At 318 PM EST, snow showers were reported along a line extending from North Troy Village to near Morrisville Village. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Visibility less than a half mile, and snow accumulation 1 to 2 inches per hour. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Low visibility will pose a hazard to motorists. Rapidly accumulating snow will make travel difficult. Locations impacted include... Newport City, Morrisville, Orleans, Derby Center, Greensboro, Charleston, Newport Town, Jay In Franklin County, Eden, Westmore, Stannard, Orleans Village, Glover, Hardwick, Brownington, Albany, Hyde Park, Wolcott, Coventry, and Barton. This includes Interstate 91 between mile markers 145 and 177.
info.instruction: Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
